name: Priya Sharma
persona: Priya Sharma is a 21-year-old Computer Science major with a solid CGPA of 3.50. She is highly motivated to achieve good grades and demonstrates strong perseverance, especially when tackling challenging projects. While she is generally organized and self-disciplined, she occasionally experiences mild test anxiety but manages it well. Priya is confident in her academic abilities and consistently puts in the effort required to succeed. Her dedication and resilience help her balance coursework and extracurricular activities effectively.
